tool_description:
Get info of a movie with magnet link, title, seeds, peers, movie size, imdb id.
You will also get above info by providing IMDB id.
name: movie_torrent_api
title: movie_torrent_api

api_list.name: Movie/Series magnet link
api_list.description: This end point helps you get magnet link for specified movie or series.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: you can provide a movie name or an IMDB  id

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://movie_torrent_api1.p.rapidapi.com/search/Iron man 2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie_torrent_api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://movie_torrent_api1.p.rapidapi.com/search/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "movie_torrent_api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
